column5: Over the next 48 hours I will be adding a few modifications to make life easier for everyone. This may mean a five minute down time here and there. The chat will also be gonig in tonight as well as a 'Who's Chatting' list. After today your signature will only appear once in a thread. IF you respond a second time in the same thread it will not have the sig line.
I won't be around until about 11 pm tonight, so no chat for me, playing darts.
